actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize post exchange and commissary store privileges for persons who have met all the requirements for retired pay under chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, other than attaining 60 years of age.

summary.text: Entitles certain nonregular members of the armed forces who have met all the requirements for retired pay, but not attained 60 years of age, to post-exchange and commissary privileges.

titles.title: A bill to authorize post exchange and commissary store privileges for persons who have met all the requirements for retired pay under chapter 67 of title 10, United States Code, other than attaining 60 years of age.
